name: EpicSummonerMonsterRaidHeroArenaDungeon
description:
Turn-based battle fans will all agree that this does indeed have turn-based battles!

Is it the greatest game ever? Well, I made it so I'm gonna say it is!

Fight in dungeons that do not scale the rewards to the difficulty increase!

Battle in the arena that is mostly just getting lucky with good team match up!

No story because I can't think of one!

There are infinite* combinations you can use when making a team and upgrading your units!

Play now and experience something that is pretty simple and basic all things considered.

*it's not actually infinite, but if my statistics are correct, there are at least 5,527,200 possible team combinations. 

ALSO serious note: This is just a big project for me to better understand how to save/load player save data/level data/character data on unreal engine. Since I'm mostly doing this for fun, I don't have the time/interest in making a bunch of nice sound effects, high quality character/background art, or making things look super great in general. My main goal was for this to just work. And it does. So I'm pretty satisfied with it.

i feel like i should say MOST of the sounds were not made by me i do not claim to own them. besides the file select music, i did not make or claim to own any of the music. does my roblox character count as roblox property? the backgrounds i got off pexel.com. im not profiting off of this game so i should be good regardless..?
